content: Low-Earth orbit launch #LEO-A1: small weather satellite, rideshare on FalconWing rocket prototype.
Geo-stationary launch #GEO-Comm: communications satellite, 5-ton payload, new heavy-lift rocket.
metadata: Date: 2025-03-28, operator: gina.rossi@aero.co, final fueling check

content: Sun-synchronous orbit #SSO-Agri: imaging satellite for crop monitoring, triple solar panel array.
metadata: Launched: 2025-04-02, mission control: hiro.tanaka@aero.co, next telemetry checkpoint in 12h

content: Lunar test orbiter #Lunar-X: investigating resources on near side, advanced propulsion test.
metadata: Launch date: 2025-04-10, integrated with new upper stage, manager: ivy.kim@aero.co

content: Mars Relay #MR-Path: relay satellite for future rovers, solar electric propulsion, 2-year cruise.
metadata: Planned: 2025-05-01, contact: jeff.teeter@aero.co, final design checks
